EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne Tour_PARENT_2019.London Post Event
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for attending SpringOne Tour 2019 in London!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=}}, It was great to see you in London at SpringOne Tour. If you want the presentation content you will find it here <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-tour-london-2019]]>. If you enjoyed the event you can also schedule an onsite workshop <[[https://pivotal.io/cloud-native-workshop]]> for your organization. And be sure to join us this October in Austin, Texas for SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/]]>, the biggest cloud-native Java conference in the world. Sign up now for a full day of pre-conference training, Spring Professional Certification <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2019/schedule]]> and the opportunity to connect with Spring community leaders. Get $200 off your SpringOne Platform ticket by using the code Attendee_SpringOneTour_200 when you register. We have two education offerings in London this April: PCF Operator <[[https://academy.pivotal.io/confirm-course?courseid=EDU-1128]]> and Pivotal Platform Acceleration Lab for Application Architects <[[https://pivotal.io/platform-acceleration-lab/pal-for-architects-java]]>. For more information, please contact Andrew Jenner (ajenner@pivotal.io <[[mailto:ajenner@pivotal.io]]>) and attendees will be asked to complete a pre-screening form. In the meantime, host your Java/Spring app on Pivotal Web Services <[[https://run.pivotal.io/spring/]]> with a $87 trial credit. I hope to see you again soon at a future event <[[https://pivotal.io/events]]>!
Thanks,
Tasha Isenberg
